sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styling/body.css' const BodyContent = ({ data }) => { const handleKelToFah = (kelvin) => ( ((kelvin - 273.15) * (9/5) + 32).toFixed(0) ); return (
{handleKelToFah(data.main.temp)}°f

Current Temperature in {data.name}

{data.weather[0].description}

{handleKelToFah(data.main.temp_min)}°f

Min. Temp

{handleKelToFah(data.main.temp_max)}°f

Max. Temp

{data.main.pressure}mb

pressure

{data.wind.speed}mp/h

wind speed

{data.main.humidity}%

humidity

) } export default BodyContent
